name: The Dark Legions
description:
OverviewThe Dark Legions is a classical real-time strategy game in the medieval ages.
Command your young hero Theodoric, whose family was slaughtered by the evil King Frank Kalap.
Build up your empire through story driven missions.
Train and lead your warriors to battle and defeat your ancient enemy, or prove your strength against computer players on randomly generated missions.Game Mechanics
  • Harvest the land
  • Build up an Empire
  • Explore on land and on Sea
  • Research new Technologies
  • Train your massive army
  • Defend yourself and vanquish your foes
